description: Variation of condition 2 to allow for an amendment to the energy statement following planning permission 01151/G/P2 dated 14/7/2017 for erection of a new three storey building with a flat roof to provide a 3FE school with school hall, classrooms and associated facilities and external play areas, landscaping, parking, access and circulation areas following demolition of existing buildings following planning permission 01151/G/P2 dated  14/07/2017.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (EPS-PE-XX-XX-DR-A-0100 P01; EPS-PE-ZZ-XX-DR-A-0200; EPS-PE-XX-01-DR-A-1200 P12; EPS-PE-XX-00-DR-A-1201 P12; EPS-PE-XX-02-DR-A-1202; EPS-PE-XX-03-DR-A-1203; EPS-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-3100 P08; EPS-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-4100 P02; EPS-PE-XX-ZZ-DR-A-3101; ALA344 L01 PL0; ALA344 L04 PL0; ALA344 L05 PL05; ALA344 L06 PL0; ALA344 L07 PL0; Design and Access Statement; Transport Assessment and Travel Plan; Design and Construction Method Statement; Air Quality Assessment; Noise Impact Assessment; Sunlight/Daylight Assessment; Land Contamination Assessment; Flood Risk Assessment including Drainage Assessment Form; Historical and Archaeological Assessment; Nature Conservation and Ecological Assessment; Received: 12/16/2016 ALA344 L03 PL2; Received 31/01/2017; Cover letter; Jet Blast and Wing Vortices Assessment; Energy Statement; Received 09/10/2019.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(3)) on 21 December 2017.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for a school and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The hard and soft landscaping details shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(6i-15i) on 16 March 2018.

Condition : 6 - In this condition "retained tree" means an existing tree which is to be retained in accordance with the approved plans and particulars; and paragraphs (a) and (b) below shall have effect until the expiration of (5 years) from (the date of the occupation of the building for its permitted use).

(a)	No retained tree shall be cut down, uprooted or destroyed, nor shall any retained tree be topped or lopped other than in accordance with the approved plans and particulars, without the written approval of the local planning authority.  Any topping or lopping approved shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard[3998 (Tree Work)] or any other BS replacing.

(b)	If any retained tree is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, another tree shall be planted at the same place and that tree shall be of such size and species, and shall be planted at such time, as may be specified in writing by the local planning authority.

(c)	The erection of fencing for the protection of any retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved plans and particulars before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought on to the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site.  Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the written consent of the local planning authority.

Condition : 7 - The car parking (including spaces for people with disabilities) and cycle parking shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(6i-15i) on 16 March 2018. The spaces shown on the approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development.
Condition : 8 - The car park management plan shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(9) on 10 July 2018. The school shall thereafter operate in accordance with the approved Plan.

Condition : 9 - The active and passive Electric Vehicle Charging Points (EVCP) within the car park area shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(6i-15i) on 16 March 2018. The approved details shall be installed and made operational before the first use of the school and thereafter maintained.

Condition : 10 - The proposal must be completed in line with obtained BREEAM Final (Post- Construction) Certificate, issued by the BRE equivalent licensing organisation, demonstrates that 61% 'Very Good' has been achieved. All the measures integrated, shall be retained for as long as the development is in existence.

Condition : 11 - The delivery and servicing plan details shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(14) on 29 June 2018. The delivery and servicing arrangements shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 12 - The pedestrian access details shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(6i-15i) on 16 March 2018. The pedestrian access shown on the approved drawing shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development.

Condition : 13 - The Community Use Agreement details shall be those approved by planning permission 01151/G/P2(16) on 31 May 2018. The school shall thereafter operate in accordance with that Agreement.
